captions.text:
These plates contain the same amount of food
but the portion looks much bigger on the smaller

plate. So replace larger plates with smaller
ones and you will end up eating less. Don't

reach for snacks using your dominate hand,
instead use your non-dominant hand and you'll

end up eating about 20% less. Short wide glasses
look like they contain the same amount as

a tall thin one. But that's an illusion, actually
they hold far more. To cut down on drinking,

use a tall thin glass. Then there's the power
of mirrors. In one experiment, psychologist

Brad Bushman. 'Hi, I'm Brad Bushman'. Place
both healthy and unhealthy food on a table

and asked people to snack away. When he placed
a mirror behind the food, they became more

self-conscious and ate more healthily. So
placing a mirror in your kitchen on on your

refrigerator door. You'll consume fewer calories
each day if you chew gum when you feel hungry.

And go for fruit flavoured gum, because mint
flavour makes some healthy food taste strange.

People who eat quickly consume more. To eat
less, just slow down and, place your fork

or spoon down between each bite. Research
shows that people eat fewer snacks when they

are served on red plates, perhaps because
red is associated with stop. Either way, when

you have the choice, go for red plates and
bowls. You eat more when you watch television.

And so simple turning off your TV at mealtimes
means that you will consume up to 50% less.

Just taking a photograph of all of the unhealthy
food you eat will help you cut down on unhealthy

eating by around about a third. Whenever we
see lots of different varieties of food we

are tempted to try some of each. To eat less,
serve the same amount of food, but cut down
on the variety.

comments.author: francis giamanis

comments.text:
Thanks for the tips! <3 I've been eating more than usual recently, and 
maybe it's the stress of college finally getting to me, or my wacky sleep 
schedule, or maybe it's just a time-of-the-month thing right now, but I 
still do not like counting up my calories at the end of the day to see that 
I made it past the 2000 mark :/  I feel like The Very Hungry Caterpillar, 
and it doesn't help that I haven't been to the gym in over a week. *le sigh* 
I need to get on track and learn to listen to my body better. The body is 
amazing and truly does its best to maintain life, so it's only a matter of 
dedication and self-control to get healthy. It's funny how I am good at 
staying quiet and listening, but when it comes to listening to what is 
closest, my own body, I struggle like crazy. Ah well. I mustn't ever give 
up. I feel like the day that I stop thinking about weight loss is the day I 
eat myself to death, and I don't ever want that to happen.﻿
comments.author: neldabg

comments.text:
В этом коротком видеоролике собраны 10 работающих способов, как начать есть 
меньше:
1. Использовать меньшие тарелки
2. Есть левой рукой (для правшей)
3. Пить из высоких тонких стаканов
4. Поместить зеркало на кухне
5. Жуйте жвачку, когда голодны
6. Есть медленнее
7. Есть из красной посуды
8. Выключать телевизор
9. Фотографируйте вредную еду
10. Избегайте разнообразия

comments.text:
This is a very stupid video. THE FAT YOU EAT THE FAT YOU WEAR!!!! Right! If 
you eat animal products like - dairy, meat and fish or if you are frying 
all the time that's why people are putting on weight. I follow a simple 
VEGAN diet - low fat, low salt and gluten free diet - I just follow Dr Neal 
Bernard vegan diet and I am skinny and healthy like I had never been before 
and I FEAST LIKE A COW. I eat fruits, salad - no dressing or dressing made 
from vegetables. Vegetables I steamed.... People learn to restrict calories 
but calorie its not equal calorie isn't it.... If I have 5 bananas its not 
going to be the same as 5 mars were you are consuming 70% fat.
Yesterday, I had about 5000 calories of fruit and vegetables. You are 
restricting calories to 1500 for a month or two or maybe 3 and really you 
are on starvation mood.... After a while you really lost water not fat... 
and you go back to old "diet". Babies need 1500 calories per day and they 
don't do much aren't they... so as a adult female I need at least 2500 - 
3000 min calories per day. Calroies wich come from fruits and plants.... 
not animal flesh.﻿

comments.author: Tank Hurl

comments.text:
+Mati Kot 
The reason you're skinny and healthy is because your diet contains little 
to no industrial sugar, processed foods, added flavors, etc. Carbs don't 
harm you, meat doesn't, protein and fat don't, all of that is ok for us to 
eat.
The truth is that in a supermarket about 60-80% of items contain industrial 
sugar, added flavors, etc. That is what makes people fat and sick. That 
shit is in products that don't even need it. It's just designed to get 
people addicted and consume more of it.
Look at the ingredients, avoid the true crap, do some sports if you eat a 
lot (preferably also if you don't), get sunlight, a good night sleep, 
you'll be fine.

comments.author: Paul L

comments.text:
+Paul L When I say "natural", I mean things that aren't processed like 
sugars and pointless carbs. Those are the things to avoid. Like cutting out 
fast food and trips to the candy store. In essence, although she's right 
about eating fruits and vegetables as her diet, the common misconception 
about "fat making you fat" is something she's wrong about and something I 
wanted to point out. And to say protein isn't bad (in moderation).
comments.author: Enderbro

comments.text: +Enderbro What !? Why is one food more "natural" than another  ?
comments.author: Paul L

comments.text:

absolutely right to eat more natural things like vegetables and such.

comments.text:
Being skinny is NOT any healthier than being fat.

I very much doubt that you could eat 5000 calories of food a day by just 
eating fruit and veg and even if you did you would be very fat if you 
continued that type of diet. That's because a woman's recommended calorific 
intake is around 2000, so you are consuming 2.5 times the amount of 
calories that is recommended. Calories are calories, it doe not matter if 
they are from fruit, veg, beer or, meat.

A banana has roughly 100 calories so you would have to eat 50 to intake 
5000 calories.
I picked bananas because it contains more cals than most fruit, ie you coud 
not even eat 5000 cals in a day if if was just cucumber, I think you would 
need to each about 300 (and thats a conservative guess) tomatoes, youd need 
about 400 every day.

Also a balanced diet is NOT just fruit and veg. Have you head of Food 
groups ? Look up "scurvy" it shows how important a varied diet is.

comments.text:
Put a fist sized meal in your plate. or fist and a half. That's all the 
food you really need. People tend to put a lot of shit, get half way 
through it and feel full. But still eat the other half because it's a bad 
thing to waste food. How about you put less in your plate in the first 
place? Peoples stupidity amazes me. I've experimented on how much i can go 
on without eating a lot, turns out all you really need is 2 meals a day. 
Two normal sized meals. No micro meal bullshit. U either eat breakfast and 
dinner. or dinner and supper. But don't eat 3-4 hours before bed. And it's 
fine to skip a meal, because u can eat a larger portion on your next meal. 
U can't believe how better food tastes when you're actually hungry and not 
stuffing yourself all day long.﻿
comments.author: tulp35000

comments.text:

comments.text:
the only thing i could see here that would actually work for me is slowing 
down while eating.  that would give the food time to expand in my stomach.

stop me if i at the exact same thing for more then two weeks straight﻿
